body: @Arekkusu98 @Megas-Cadron  Balalika and Chen being together is related to the anime specials. In it there was one episode where Balalika and Chen were married and the children they have together are Hansel and Gretal - both in the special and this doujin.
@Arekkusu98, only new characters are the kids, because last I checked, Balalika isnt married to Chen. If they did, some cosmic event must have gotten them together because that ain't right
Black Lagoon weirdness at it's peak.
Are these new characters from the manga??? I only watched the anime damn
okay so, wtf is this shit?!😂😂
